ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class OSMDroidMapActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.OSMDroidMapActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.MapEventsReceiver

    public class OSMDroidMapActivity
extends Activity
implements org.osmdroid.bonuspack.overlays.MapEventsReceiver
    OSMDroidMapActivity is a class for allowing a user to select and set a location from OSMDroid's map. It creates a mapview and displays the user's current location by obtaining the gps location. Then allows users to touch the screen to select their desired location

        public void onClickGeo(View v)
